* Steve Morrison (TV producer) (born 1947), Scottish TV producer and former Rector of the University of Edinburgh
In 2015 McColl became the fourth Rector to stand for re-election. He lost to his opponent, media executive Steve Morrison, who won with 61.9% of the vote.

link_mentions.page: University of Edinburgh School of Social and Political Science
response: * Steve Morrison, television producer and former Rector of the University of Edinburgh

In February 2018, Henderson was voted Rector of the University of Edinburgh, becoming the second woman to hold the position following Muriel Gray. She beat the only other candidate, Marco Bauder, with 77% of the vote. She replaced the outgoing Rector, Steve Morrison. In 2021, it was announced Henderson would leave the role by March 1, with Debora Kayembe set to take over her role.
